sources.title: Its_Good_To_Be_Alive
sources.description: From IMDB http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0071676/ The story of former Brooklyn Dodger catcher Roy Campanella, whose career was cut short when he lost the use of his legs in an auto accident in January of 1958. Writers: Steve Gethers (teleplay), Roy Campanella (book) Stars: Paul Winfield, Louis Gossett Jr. and Ruby Dee
